name: In Search of Mana
description:
Game for "Go Godot Jam 2" where you play
as a mage who wants to return his source of mana.

Controls:
     A, D - move
     W, Space - jump (also use space for next dialogue box)
     Q - shoot
     E - block projectile
     Z - turn on light 

Credits:

  • Technical stuff - Aleksandr
  • Game Design - Nikita
  • Translation - Jelly_Ice

  • Tilemap
